ygData.subject: Quest Info Req (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: I know this is off topic and not related (as far as I know) to Bards specifically, but there are some very knowledgeable people on this list and I haven t
ygData.messageBody:
I know this is off topic and not related (as far as I know) to Bards
specifically, but there are some very knowledgeable people on this list and
I haven't found the answer elsewhere..

I have looted a blurred map. I'm sure it's for some quest, I've even heard
rumors that it has something to do with someone in Qeynos that's building a
"titanic bridge" from Qeynos to Erudin. I've also heard rumors that the
quest actually isn't working right now.

Could anyone give a spoiler as to what to do with this map? (It's a Lore
Item) Even a pointer of where to go or something would be appreciated..

Happy journeys and in tune songs..
